title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 340.1 - Policy
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 340.1 - Policy

State Regulations

It is the policy of the university that each school of
medicine and dentistry and the College of Optometry shall have a plan for the
management of clinical practice income that is consistent with the requirements
set forth in this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
340.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
